name: New Google Plus  (dark)
description: Updated. It's essentialy Google Plus, but in Red and Dark gray.
additional_info:
Last update:
-Names in comment are now white (instead of black).
-Small three dots are now in red with dark background in post description.

Updated : 
- All divs are now with a dark background (comments, etc.)
- The +1 logo was updated. 
- Profiles are now also dark.
